roleset.name: to surround, border
roleset.note: SKIRT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls contiguous_location-47.8, meander-47.7. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from skirt.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The ground along the Embarcadero, the street that-1 [*T*-1] skirts the city 's eastern boundary and piers -- dropped six inches after the quake , [*]wreaking major damage to at least one of the piers .
example.arg: the city 's eastern boundary and piers

example.name: transitive
example.text: But Mr. Breeden , a 39-year-old securities lawyer , has skirted some of the heftier issues facing the financial markets .
example.arg: some of the heftier issues facing the financial markets
